review_data.title: Great chinese food

review_data.title: Pan Asian food - good value
review_data.content: Their location and interior are not exciting. If you come here it's for the food, not the ambiance. The restaurant is run by Chinese. They offer a good value pan Asian lunch set including a drink for 18 CHF and the food is tasty.

review_data.title: sichuan style in Zurich
review_data.content: As a big fan of dim sum and getting spoiled with all Cantonese restaurant in London, it is a positive surprise to find Beyond in Zurich. Beyond is more a northie type of restaurant, which means it layers the flavor in its cooking, so don't...More

review_data.title: The Best Chinese Restaurant Ever!
review_data.content: We never expected this, some forums says this is the only Chinese restaurant in Zurich where people from the Chinese embassy go for food. So we went to ry this restaurant, located on the street bordering the Main Train Station, at the rear end. It...More

review_data.title: Good authentic Sichuan food
review_data.content: Having lived in China for nearly two years, I can say that the restaurant provides authentic Chinese (mostly from Sichuan province) food. Also there were often Chinese people eating in this restaurant whenever I visited, so I don't quite understand the complaints that the food...More

review_data.title: Authentische
review_data.content: chinesische Küche. Einfach, klar und gut. Gute Lage nahe am Hauptbahnhof. Einrichtung schlicht gehalten. Zu empfehlen für schlichte chinesische Küche.

review_data.title: Horrible experience!

review_data.title: Good Szechuan food
review_data.content: Their szechuan dishes are really good, if you like spicy. Try the spicy fish soup. Also liked the sweet and sour ribs (they don't use that standard, out-of-the-bottle bright-red s&s sauce) and their duck. Appetizers are so-so, I'd rather skip them and order more main...More

review_data.title: I pay for food not for waiter's comments...

review_data.title: Nicht gut, laut, deprimierend
review_data.content: Leider ein deprimierender Abend. Lange aufs Essen gewartet, welches lieblos zusammengebrätelt ist und auch entsprechend schmeckt.

review_data.title: Poor quality of food and services

review_data.title: Rubbish
review_data.content: If you like a few vegetables and a bit of cheap meat with heaps of salt and sugar then this is the place for you.

review_data.title: Best chinese in Zürich
review_data.content: Small menu for Europeans big menu for Chinese. The best signal is that a lot of Chinese people actually dine here. The food is amazing the sechuan duck is exceptional. Don't get fooled by the bad reviews, the food is great.

review_data.title: Comparatively authentic Chinese food

review_data.title: Excellent - on par with the best Chinese food I've eaten anywhere and definitely the best in Zurich

review_data.title: The ONLY place to go for Chinese food in Zürich!

review_data.title: Most Authentic Chinese Food in Town

review_data.title: The food contained MSG!!
review_data.content: It is the first time we went there. But the Food contained MSG. It caused the MSG Allergy of my Husband and being suffering for the next three days. We will never go back to this restaurant anymore!! We are confused why people like the...More

review_data.title: Great food, no frills!
review_data.content: Authentic chinese and thai food at great prices. You sit on benches not chairs, so it is pretty uncomfortable, but you will come back for the food. Evening menu not so cheap but fantastic, especially dishes marked with 3 chilis.

review_data.title: Noodles blend, service cold.

review_data.title: A bit of a disappointment

review_data.title: Good Chinese Food
review_data.content: Beyond serves good authentic chinese food in a nice clean environment. my friends and i were craving for some good asian food and found this place. we loved the dish in fish-broth and the aubergine.
